meanings.definition: A tag attached to a product for identification or promotional purposes.
meanings.sent1: The hangtag on the shirt had the brand logo.
meanings.sent2: I always look at the hangtag to check the care instructions.
meanings.sent3: The hangtag on the toy made it look like a special collector's item.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was like a hangtag, revealing her unique style.
meanings.sent5: The bright red hangtag stood out among the other labels.

meanings.definition: To attach a hangtag to a product.
meanings.sent1: She carefully hangtagged each item before displaying them.
meanings.sent2: Remember to hangtag the new arrivals before putting them on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: He hangtags so quickly, it's like magic!
meanings.sent4: The artist hangtags her creations with care and creativity.
meanings.sent5: Hangtagging the products gives them a professional touch.
